title: Ashton-under-Lyne
summary: Ashton-under-Lyne is a market town in Tameside, Greater Manchester, England.[1] The population was 45,198 at the 2011 census.[2] Historically in Lancashire, it is on the north bank of the River Tame, in the foothills of the Pennines, 6.2 miles (10.0Â km) east of Manchester.
